title: AI Demand Strains Japan Cable Firm Fujikura After Stock Surge
description: Fujikura Ltd.’s stock has surged about 1,400% over the last two years as new data centers globally have created an insatiable appetite for its cables. There’s only one problem — the company can’t keep up with demand.
content: Fujikura Ltd.’s stock has surged about 1,400% over the last two years as new data centers globally have created an insatiable appetite for its cables. There’s only one problem — the company can’t keep up with demand.
